Upcoming Tests

Social Studies - Chapter 3 December 10th (pages 84-136)

Winter Festival Countdown!

Get Ready to Shine at the Winter Festival

Winter Festival Practice Reminder

Less than 2 weeks to go—Let’s Get Festival Ready!

Time to Practice for the Winter Festival!  

The video is below!

Reading

Complete up to page 370 in the My View Book

Complete the definition paper. Please find the words in the story.

The story this week is Welcome Back Wolves.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h5ZXpqMFQy0

The spelling test is on Friday! Please look over them every day!

solitary
multiplied
plentiful
government
threatened 
livestock
decades
biodiversity 
ecosystem
negatives
myth
tourism

risks

Extra reading ( I have added some new stories)

TO IMPROVE READING AND EMBED LEARNING, YOU SHOULD BE LOGGING INTO READWORKS

Please go to ReadWorks and complete some of the stories assigned. They will assist you with your schoolwork and also enhance your overall reading skills.

Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Enter our class code YU6GQ2
Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it.

Math

Complete Additional Practice 7-2 (Student book and homework book)

I have added New Khan Academy lessons related to data.

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night
 at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.

Science  (tomorrow)

Please complete 134-135 in the science textbook

Social Studies (tomorrow)

Read and complete pages 118-123  in the textbook.

Language Arts
Grammar Workshop - 90-91 (Thursday)

Spanish
Write the Spanish words of the song Golden (Thursday)

Chinese
Memorize the worksheet given in class by Next Tuesday.
